de.bioforscher.singa.chemistry.parser.plip

Class InteractionContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.chemistry.parser.plip.InteractionContainer

  • public class InteractionContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The interaction container takes all interactions in a PLIP xml-file that was generated using the inter-chain interaction annotation feature.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InteractionContainer()
      Creates a new empty interaction container.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InteractionContainer

        public InteractionContainer()
        Creates a new empty interaction container.

    • Method Detail

      • getInteractionsBetween

        public java.util.List<Interaction> getInteractionsBetween(LeafIdentifier first,
                                                          LeafIdentifier second)
        Returns all Interactions between two leaves (i.e. two residues.). If no interactions are present an empty list is returned. The order in which the LeafIdentifiers are given is irrelevant.
        Parameters:
        first - The first leaf.
        second - The second leaf.
        Returns:
        A list of interactions between both leaves.

      • hasInteractions

        public boolean hasInteractions(LeafIdentifier first,
                               LeafIdentifier second)
        Returns true if any interaction between the two leaves is annotated in this container.
        Parameters:
        first - The first leaf.
        second - The second leaf.
        Returns:
        True, if any interaction between the two leaves is annotated.

      • mapToPseudoAtoms

        public void mapToPseudoAtoms(Structure structure)
        Adds the interactions in this container to a structure as pseudo atoms. Every interactions is assigned a new LeafSubstructure that has a three letter code according to the type of interaction. The pseudo atom is positioned a the center of the annotated interaction centers.
        Parameters:
        structure - The structure to assign the interaction to.

      • getInteractions

        public java.util.List<Interaction> getInteractions()
        Retuens all interactions from this container.
        Returns:
        All interactions.

      • getLigandInteractions

        public java.util.List<Interaction> getLigandInteractions()

      • addInteraction

        public void addInteraction(Interaction interaction)
        Adds an interaction to this container. Symmetrical interactions are not added twice. If possible overlapping interactions are merged.
        Parameters:
        interaction - The interaction to add.

      • validateWithStructure

        public void validateWithStructure(Structure structure)
